name: Audiobook Narrator
description: Warm, engaging voice for long-form audiobook narration. Rich mid-range with clear articulation and subtle emotional variation.

name: Documentary Narrator
description: Authoritative, clear voice for educational and documentary content. Crisp enunciation with commanding presence and BBC-influenced precision.

name: Storytelling Narrator
description: Expressive, dynamic voice for theatrical storytelling and dramatic readings. Wide pitch range with excellent character differentiation.

name: Young Protagonist
description: Bright, energetic voice embodying youthful optimism and determination. Perfect for coming-of-age stories and heroic young characters.

name: Wise Mentor
description: Measured, thoughtful voice carrying experience without weariness. Perfect for advisor characters and guides who impart wisdom.

name: Elderly Sage
description: Ancient, weathered voice with depth of accumulated wisdom. Perfect for wizards, elders, and keepers of ancient knowledge.
